item.description: THE SHOW WILL GO ON! BUT IT WILL BE ON WEDNESDAY MARCH 20th! SAME TIME, Same Place. Justine will be here in Maine, presenting snippets of her new DVD, and giving us some inside details on filming it! Join us in welcoming Justine to Southern Maine! Sponsored by the local Paddling Community and by Kayak Ways LLC, Southern Maine Sea Kayaking Network, Maine Island Kayak Co, Lincoln Kayak and Canoe, and Coastal Maine Kayak. The presentation starts at 7pm and admission is free. There will be autographed copies of "This is the Sea! 5", DVD's available for sale.
item.name: SNOW DATE! Justine Curvengen is coming to Falmouth Library!
